$description: Core breakpoint and content width primitives for responsive design.

xs.$description: Extra small breakpoint (576px). Large phones, small tablets.

md.$description: Medium breakpoint (992px). Tablets landscape, standard laptops.

lg.$description: Large breakpoint (1200px). Large laptops, standard desktops.

xl.$description: Extra large breakpoint (1408px). Large desktop monitors.

sm.$description: Small content width (600px). Use for: prose content.

lg.$description: Large content width (1280px). Use for: full application layouts.
